news.title: China invites U.S. business leaders to Beijing as it tries to decipher Trump's trade plans
news.summary: China courted the executives of major U.S. businesses this week in a sign of how Beijing seeks to offset trade pressures, rather than retaliate forcefully.

news.title: Trump pledges auto, pharma tariffs in 'near future,' sowing more trade confusion
news.summary: President Donald Trump has praised tariffs and announced an array of import duties on specific countries and products since taking office. President Trump has announced tariffs on a variety of countries, products and countries.

news.title: Affirm announces JPMorgan Chase merchants can now offer installment loans at checkout
news.summary: U.S. merchants who use JPMorgan to handle payments can now add Affirm to their checkout pages. Affirm is a mobile payment app that works with Apple, Android and Samsung devices.

news.title: Napster pioneered music sharing over 25 years ago. It just got bought for $207 million
news.summary: Napster is getting acquired by Infinite Reality for $207 million. It's the latest chapter for a company whose brand is synonymous with early music sharing.

news.title: Trump Media shares jump on announcement of ETF deal with Crypto.com
news.summary: President Trump's media company announced an agreement with Crypto.com on Monday to launch ETFs and related products. The deal is expected to be worth an estimated $1 billion.
